oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Old Friendsville Academy Farm
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of the Old Friendsville Academy Farm. Back row (left to right): Carra Bivens, Edward Bivens, Larkin Young (father-in-law of Carra). Boy seated on ground is Beecher Bivens, son of Carra. Old Academy farmhouse in in the background. It was burned down in the 1950s or 1960s.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Farms; People; Families
